topic.title: So... This is it?
topic.body:
This is our bunker...

In less than a month's time, (((globalist elites))) will be getting their muddy paws all over the internet, taking down entire DNS servers, sites and more because it doesn't fit with their ideas of free speech.

Here we can say what we want, I don't suppose our Philipino Rice Plantation Messageboard will last long when (((they))) get full power and start shutting down sites, even so.. Before that happens we ought to build this place up a bit.

You have 21 days to prepare for the shitstorm, don't forget that other, more based DNS servers are still around and the fact that they're so many means the kikes will be pulling their hair out getting rid of it all. This place alone stands as a testament to that.

If you're concerned about anonymity, go to the dankweb, use a fucking Proxy, get a fucking VPN. Zeronet is NOT these things. It stands as a bunker for resilience.
We can say what we want here without getting shut down... A great place to still communicate under outright (shut it down) happenings.

In the mean time, we can build this place up, we can get other anons to know about it before it's too late!

Godspeed you magnificent bastards, it's been an honor shitposting with you

1_12PQwF7zb6gKMrWPcP555CqkTyYHY5qzmi.body: There's also 0chan, but shit is so slow on Zeronet, sort of reminiscent to the old days I guess.
